block.p: GALLAGHER - Margaret Mary (Peggy) on September 13, 2000 of Great Neck. Beloved wife of the late John J. Loving mother of Jay, Eileen and daughter-in-law Kathleen. Cherished grandmother of Conor and Caitlin. Beloved sister of Catherine, Balmer and Theresa Richter. In repose at the Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset, Friday 3-5 & 7-9 pm. Funeral Mass Sat. 9am St. Marys R.C. Church, Manhasset. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to St. Francis Development Fund, 100 Pt. Washington Blvd., Roslyn, NY 11576
